title: Alec Baldwin fired prop gun that killed photography chief, injured director on film set | ABC7
author: ABC7
description: Actor Alec Baldwin has been identified as the person who fired a prop firearm that killed a crew member and left director Joel Souza hospitalized in an incident on the set of a Western being filmed in New Mexico. Full story: https://abc7.com/rust-alec-baldwin-movie-set-shooting-accident/11152944/
